attributes.action: Intervene to stop the Goan government from confiscating our properties !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the changes in property laws(FEMA,RBI) it is no longer possible for foreign nationals to own property in Goa(despite what agents, developers and Goan lawyers say)Thus some 380+ British people(mainly retired) have been served notices that their property may be confiscated by the Goan government !(Potential new purchasers will also face the same fate)
Despite all this British based agents CONTINUE TO ADVERTISE PROPERTY FOR SALE THERE! This illegal practice must cease forthwith in the UK and the British public MUST be made aware of all the facts of purchasing property  in Goa via the media

government_responses.details:
